00024 #include <vle/devs/Dynamics.hpp>
00025 #include <vle/utils/Debug.hpp>
00026 #include <vle/utils/i18n.hpp>
00027 
00028 #include <vle/devs/DynamicsDbg.hpp>
00029 
00030 
00031 class Buffer : public vle::devs::Dynamics
00032 {
00033 public:
00034     Buffer(const vle::devs::DynamicsInit& init,
00035            const vle::devs::InitEventList& events) :
00036         vle::devs::Dynamics(init, events)
00037     { }
00038 
00039     virtual ~Buffer()
00040     { }
00041 
00042     virtual void output(const vle::devs::Time& /* time */,
00043                         vle::devs::ExternalEventList& output) const
00044     {
00045         if (mPhase == SEND) {
00046             std::map < std::string, double >::const_iterator it =
00047                 mValues.begin();
00048 
00049             while (it != mValues.end()) {
00050                 vle::devs::ExternalEvent* ee = buildEvent(it->first);
00051                 
00052                 ee << vle::devs::attribute("name", it->first);
00053                 ee << vle::devs::attribute("value", it->second);
00054                 output.addEvent(ee);
00055                 ++it;
00056             }
00057         } else if (mPhase == FULL) {
00058             output.addEvent(buildEvent("ok"));
00059         } else if (mPhase == SEND_CANCEL) {
00060             output.addEvent(buildEvent("cancel"));
00061         }
00062     }
00063 
00064     virtual vle::devs::Time init(const vle::devs::Time& /* time */)
00065     {
00066         if (not getModel().existInputPort("send")) {
00067             throw vle::utils::InternalError(
00068                 vle::fmt(_("[%1%] Buffer: send inport missing")) %
00069                 getModelName());
00070         }
00071 
00072         if (not getModel().existOutputPort("ok")) {
00073             throw vle::utils::InternalError(
00074                 vle::fmt(_("[%1%] Buffer: ok outport missing")) %
00075                 getModelName());
00076         }
00077 
00078         if (not getModel().existOutputPort("cancel")) {
00079             throw vle::utils::InternalError(
00080                 vle::fmt(_("[%1%] Buffer: cancel outport missing")) %
00081                 getModelName());
00082         }
00083 
00084         if (getModel().getOutputPortNumber() !=
00085             getModel().getInputPortNumber() + 1) {
00086             throw vle::utils::InternalError(
00087                 vle::fmt(_("[%1%] Buffer: wrong output port number")) %
00088                 getModelName());
00089         }
00090 
00091         mVariableNumber = getModel().getInputPortNumber() - 1;
00092         mLastTime = vle::devs::Time::negativeInfinity;
00093         mPhase = IDLE;
00094         mWaiting = mVariableNumber;
00095         return vle::devs::Time::infinity;
00096     }
00097 
00098     virtual vle::devs::Time timeAdvance() const
00099     {
00100         if (mPhase == IDLE) {
00101             return vle::devs::Time::infinity;
00102         } else {
00103             return 0;
00104         }
00105     }
00106 
00107     virtual void internalTransition(const vle::devs::Time& /* time */)
00108     {
00109         if (mPhase == SEND) {
00110             if (mWaiting == 0) {
00111                 mPhase = IDLE;
00112             }
00113         } else if (mPhase == FULL) {
00114             mPhase = IDLE;
00115         } else if (mPhase == SEND_CANCEL) {
00116             mPhase = IDLE;
00117         }
00118     }
00119 
00120     virtual void externalTransition(const vle::devs::ExternalEventList& event,
00121                                     const vle::devs::Time& time)
00122     {
00123         vle::devs::ExternalEventList::const_iterator it = event.begin();
00124 
00125         while (it != event.end()) {
00126             if ((*it)->onPort("send")) {
00127                 if (mWaiting == 0) {
00128                     mPhase = SEND;
00129                 }
00130             } else {
00131                 if ((*it)->existAttributeValue("value")) {
00132                     std::string name = (*it)->getStringAttributeValue("name");
00133                     double value = (*it)->getDoubleAttributeValue("value");
00134 
00135                     if (mLastTime < time) {
00136                         mValues.clear();
00137                         mLastTime = time;
00138                         mWaiting = mVariableNumber;
00139                         mPhase = SEND_CANCEL;
00140                     }
00141                     mValues[name] = value;
00142                     --mWaiting;
00143                     if (mWaiting == 0) {
00144                         mPhase = FULL;
00145                     }
00146                 }
00147             }
00148             ++it;
00149         }
00150     }
00151 
00152 private:
00153     enum Phase { IDLE, SEND, FULL, SEND_CANCEL };
00154 
00155     std::map < std::string, double > mValues;
00156     Phase mPhase;
00157     vle::devs::Time mLastTime;
00158     unsigned int mVariableNumber;
00159     unsigned int mWaiting;
00160 };
